name: Dion
description:
Dion is a skill based 3D First Person Jumping Puzzle Game created by 14 students during one semester from March 2018 until August 2017.
In this game you need to use your hand cannon and your grappling hook, which are integrated in your armor, to perform rocket jump like stunts and smoothly swing across great distances in order to climb five gigantic towers.
